meanings.definition: A tag attached to a product for identification or promotional purposes.
meanings.sent1: The hangtags on the clothes show the price and size.
meanings.sent2: I always look at the hangtags on the toys to see if they are safe for my child.
meanings.sent3: The hangtags on the fruit made them look like they were dressed up for a party.
meanings.sent4: The hangtags fluttered in the wind like colorful butterflies on the products.
meanings.sent5: The shiny hangtags on the bags caught the customers' attention immediately.

meanings.definition: To attach a hangtag to a product for branding or information.
meanings.sent1: She carefully hangtags each item in the store to make them look more appealing.
meanings.sent2: We need to hangtags the new products before displaying them on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: He hangtags the gifts with funny messages to surprise his friends.
meanings.sent4: The artist hangtags his paintings with his signature to mark them as his own.
meanings.sent5: The gardener hangtags each plant with care instructions for the buyers.
